import { Add, Remove } from '@material-ui/icons'; import React from 'react' import styled from "styled-components"; import "./Cart.css" import NavBar from '../../Navbar/NavBar'; import ScrollToTop from '../../ScrollToTop'; import Anouncement from '../../Navbar/Anouncement'; import Newsletter from '../../Newsletter/Newsletter'; import Footer from '../../Footer/Footer'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const TopButton = styled.button` padding: 10px; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; border: ${(props)=>props.type === "filled" && "none"}; background-color: ${(props) => props.type === "filled" ? "black" : "none" }; color: ${(props) => props.type === "filled" && "white"}; ` const ProductColor = styled.div` width: 20px; height: 20px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: ${(props)=>props.color}; ` const Cart = () => { const cart = useSelector(state=> state.cart); return ( <>

Your Bag

Continue Shopping

Shopping Bag (2)

Your Wishlist (0)

Check Out Now
{cart.products.map((product)=>(

{product.title}

{product._id}

{product.size}

{product.quantity}

$ {product.price}

))}

Order Summary

Subtotal:

$50

Estimated shipping:

$5

Discount:

-$5.90

Total:

$100

) } export default Cart
